## NFTDrop.claim() method

Claim an NFT from the drop with connected wallet

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
claim(): Promise<string>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;string&gt;

- the mint address of the claimed NFT

## Example


```jsx
const address = await program.claim();
```
